review.classdesign.jammy.addons.java.internal

Class JavaProjectBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • review.classdesign.jammy.addons.java.internal.JavaProjectBuilder

  • public final class JavaProjectBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A JavaProjectBuilder provides tools for creating and / or configuring Java project into the current workspace instance.
    Author:
    fv

      • build

        public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject build(java.lang.String name,
                                                        org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                                 throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Creates if not exist, and configures the given project as a valid Java project instance.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the project to create.
        monitor - Monitor instance used for project creation.
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - If any error occurs during project creation and / or configuration.
